EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Webinar_The Greenfield Journey_Q415.Reminder day before
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: You are registered for tomorrow's webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We'd like to remind you of your registration for tomorrow's Ensuring Cloud Native Success: The Greenfield Journey on Thursday, December 10, 2015. Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, December 10, 2015 Time: 10:30 AM Mumbai / 1:00 PM Singapore / 4:00 PM Sydney Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1101252/F626EC180AF2686A58F3E9AFFD0DF82B]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.Save the Date - APJ Greenfield:default=edit me}}
We Look Forward to you Joining us! The Pivotal Team
